DESC - Description:
To the esteemed Arch-Mage Trebonius Artorius, Guildmaster of Vvardenfell,

Upon receiving this letter you will step down from your post as Arch-Mage, as from this day forward, an important member of the Guild shall handle all affairs in Vvardenfell. You may keep the title of Arch-Mage, but you will retire from active participation in the affairs of the Guild.

In the Emperor's Name,

Ocato
